## West Lawrence Greening Project

This is a story map made through <https://storymaps.arcgis.com/en/>. The story map demonstrates the lack of walkability and canopy in West Lawrence neighborhoods. More details can be found at <https://www.arcgis.com/apps/Cascade/index.html?appid=21536c10fe15412aa449045c9c6b0444>.
